src:
載620人法國列車與汽車相撞 釀2死3傷

05 Nov 2019, 05:11

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月05日訊】法國東部安省托西亞地區(Tossiat)一列火車3日(週日)與一輛汽車相撞，造成2人死亡，3人受傷，警方仍在調查事發原因。
事發於3日下午5時左右，一列載着620名乘客的火車，從貝爾福(Belfort)開往里昂(Lyon)，在一處平交道與一輛汽車相撞。
汽車遭到撞擊後嚴重損毀，車上一名57歲女子和一名69歲男子喪生，火車上則有3人受輕傷。
意外導致當地鐵路交通停頓，車上乘客被困車廂超過3小時，約至晚上9時左右才離開。
(責任編輯：盧勇信)
本文網址: https://www.ntdtv.com/b5/2019/11/05/a102700333.html
text:
620 French trains collided with cars, brewed 2 dead and 3 injured

05 Nov 2019, 05:11

[New Tang Dynasty, Beijing time, November 05, 2019] A train in the Tossiat region of eastern France, on the 3rd (Sunday), collided with a car, killing two people and injuring three others. The police are still investigating. Cause.
At about 5 pm on the 3rd, a train carrying 620 passengers, from Belfort to Lyon, collided with a car on a level crossing.
The car was badly damaged after being hit. A 57-year-old woman and a 69-year-old man were killed in the car, and three people were slightly injured on the train.
The accident caused the local railway traffic to stop. The passengers in the car were trapped in the car for more than 3 hours and left until about 9 pm.
(Editor: Lu Yongxin)
